testcase.name: Check the behavior of form by not filling up any data into the form.
Check the behavior of form by filling up all fields.
Check the behavior of form by filling up the required fields only.
Check the Full name text field without adding First name.
Check the Full name text field without adding Last name.
Check the full name field by filling up numeric characters instead of string.
testcase.system-err: expected:<rgba([220, 53], 69, 1)> but was:<rgba([40, 167], 69, 1)> Steps.PracticeFormSteps.lastnameAndFirstnameFieldsShouldShowTheRedBorder(PracticeFormSteps.java:117) ✽.Lastname and Firstname fields should show the red border(src/test/resources/features/PracticeForm.feature:62)

testcase.name: Check the behavior of form by filling up special characters instead of string.

testcase.name: Check the Email text field that can be empty
Check the Email text field that has random string instead of real email.
Check the Email text field that must be in correct format.
Check the Email text field that must not have a bank space.
Check the Gender field must be checked.
Mobile number field cannot be empty
Mobile field cannot contain letter or special symbols
